data_table.description: Reader-Trend-Adjusted Ultrasound, Black Females, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LOPBRT45
variable.description: Weight for LINART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: ROPBRT45
variable.description: Weight for RINART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: LBIBRT45
variable.description: 1 = if scandate on or after May 15, 1987; 0=if scandate before May 15, 1987 [1=scandate>=15may87, 0=scandate<15may87] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]
variable.value: If scandate on or after May 15

variable.name: RBIBRT45
variable.description: Mean of the RT45 variables [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: LINBRT45
variable.description: Weight for LBIART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: RINBRT45
variable.description: Weight for RBIART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: LOPBWT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LOPA [left common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: ROPBWT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, ROPA [right common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: LBIBWT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LBIA [left bifurcation] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: RBIBWT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, RBIA [right bifurcation] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: LINBWT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LINA [left internal carotid] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: RINBWT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, RINA [right internal carotid] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: MNB45_1
variable.description: Weight for LOPART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: TEMPL
variable.description: Weight for ROPART45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: TEMPR
variable.description: Weight for MNA45_1 (= number of obs sites / 6) [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black females, exam 2]
